references.paper_title: Privacy in pharmacogenetics: An end-to-end case study of personalized warfarin dosing
references.reason: This paper is among the first to introduce the concept of model inversion attacks, establishing a foundation for subsequent research in this area.

references.paper_title: The secret revealer: Generative model-inversion attacks against deep neural networks
references.reason: This paper introduces the Generative Model Inversion (GMI) attack, significantly advancing the capabilities of model inversion attacks and influencing numerous subsequent works.
This work proposes Variational Model Inversion, providing a more comprehensive and robust framework for MI attacks that enhances accuracy and effectiveness.

references.paper_title: Plug & play attacks: Towards robust and flexible model inversion attacks
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of Plug & Play attacks, improving the flexibility and efficiency of MI attacks, and thus is important for robust defense research.

references.paper_title: Pseudo label-guided model inversion attack via conditional generative adversarial network
references.reason: This paper presents the PLG-MI attack, which achieves state-of-the-art attack performance and poses a significant challenge for existing defense methods.
